original_text: And when he had brought them into his house, he set meat before them, and rejoiced, believing in God with all his house.
korean_text: 그들을 데리고 자기 집에 올라가서 음식을 차려 주고 그와 온 집안이 하나님을 믿으므로 크게 기뻐하니라

sentences.original_text: And when he had brought them into his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 자기 집으로 데려왔을 때

sentences.original_text: believing in God with all his house
